sourcesContent: // material-ui import { useTheme } from '@mui/material/styles'; import { Alert, AlertTitle, Button, Grid, IconButton } from '@mui/material'; // project imports import SubCard from 'ui-component/cards/SubCard'; import MainCard from 'ui-component/cards/MainCard'; import SecondaryAction from 'ui-component/cards/CardSecondaryAction'; import { gridSpacing } from 'store/constant'; // assets import CloseIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Close'; // ===============================|| UI ALERT ||=============================== // const UIAlert = () => { const theme = useTheme(); return ( }> This is error alert! This is warning alert! This is success alert! This is primary alert! Error This is an error alert — check it out! Warning This is a warning alert — check it out!
